page.title: 08EMPLOYMENT IN UTTOXETER CONT
page.content: Milk Marketing Board Dairy Crest Plant-260 jobs. Data from the Uttoxeter Employment Exchange for 1985 reveals that total work - including premises with under 10 people employed-stands at 8305 ( May 1985) with 792 registered as unemployed giving an "active" work force of 7576. The percentage unemployed in Uttoxeter is 8.77% well below the natioal average over 13% or 3.5 million at present. The Bamfords site, adjacent to the Derby - Stoke railway has been largely cleared and 7 small factory units are being leased out for industrial use. Plans to develop the M,M,B's site including a shopping precinct or bus station. East Staffordshire District Council plans to create 400 new jobs in Uttoxeter.
